name: Silver Lining
description: This pisco cocktail from Dan Perrigan has the refreshing lemon hit of a pisco sour but plays up the spirit's complex sweetness with a vanilla syrup, with Cocchi Americano to balance it out.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce vanilla syrup (get advice for making flavored syrups here)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to shaker. Add ice and shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe.
